message.content:
cs.SI, cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.CY, cs.CR 

The paper discusses the challenges and techniques for detecting fake news on social media, which involves analyzing user social engagements and unstructured data. This falls under the sub-category of social media analysis (cs.SI) and natural language processing (cs.CL) for analyzing the text content of news articles. Information retrieval (cs.IR) is also relevant for retrieving relevant news articles and related information. Cybersecurity (cs.CY) is another relevant sub-category for detecting and preventing the spread of fake news as a form of online misinformation. Finally, cryptography and security (cs.CR) may also be relevant for ensuring the authenticity and integrity of news sources and content.
